entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Brockville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:45 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brockville 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
Temperature: -4.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -5.0°C
Wind: NE 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light early this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
